title: Country Escape to Orange with Daily Breakfast and Wine Tasting
description: Give in to laid-back country life with a trip to Orange, NSW - a charming wine region sitting high above sea level and rapidly climbing in popularity as well. Only four hours' drive from Sydney and internationally recognised as one of Australia’s best wine districts with a growing reputation as a food capital, a trip to Orange will have you discovering its 80 vineyards, 30 cellar doors and plethora of high-end cafes and restaurants. Enjoy a three-night staying at The Oriana, Orange with daily buffet breakfast, a private wine tasting at De Salis Wines, an A$25 food and drink credit and a guaranteed late 12pm checkout so you can make the most of your final morning.

title: Regional NSW Boutique Stay in the Heart of Orange with Daily Breakfast
description:
Take your rural NSW escape up a notch with a stay at The Remington Orange, a boutique hotel in the rolling hills of Orange, a jewel in the Central Tablelands region. At The Remington Orange, you can leave the city behind and make a break for the country without forgoing the luxuries of an urban hotel. Foodies will fall in love with the onsite Whitney’s Restaurant & Bar, offering sharp culinary innovation, intimate surroundings and a focus on the region's best seasonal produce, all by the cosy glow of the crackling fireplace.

You'll be perfectly placed at the gateway to country New South Wales. Boundless jaw-dropping landscapes, world-class vineyards and orchards eagerly await across the region with a visit to Nashdale Lane Wines (only a 15-minute drive away) or at an array of renowned local restaurants, including gourmet darlings Lolli Redini, Tonic and cow-to-cone Spilt Milk Gelataria.

title: Regional NSW Boutique Stay in the Heart of Orange with Daily Breakfast
description:
Take your rural NSW escape up a notch with a stay at The Remington Orange, a boutique regional hotel in the rolling hills of Orange, a jewel in the Central Tablelands region. At The Remington Orange, you can leave the city behind and make a break for the country without forgoing the luxuries of an urban hotel. Ultra-modern amenities and fabulous facilities at this hideaway include a fitness centre, state-of-the-art technology and Whitney’s Restaurant & Bar, where you can enjoy a relaxed dinner and an innovative menu showcasing the region's best produce.

Orange is an area on the rise and NSW’s gateway to the country, boasting endless spectacular landscapes and an abundance of acclaimed vineyards and orchards. Taste your way across the region with a visit to Nashdale Lane Wines (only a 15-minute drive away) or at an array of renowned local restaurants, including Lolli Redini and Tonic, to name a few.

title: Orange Boutique Stay in Restored 19th-Century Homestead with Daily Breakfast
description:
Nestled in the heart of Orange, this sophisticated retreat effortlessly blends historic charm with contemporary elegance. Set in a beautifully restored family home, this unique property provides the perfect escape for those seeking relaxation and inspiration.

Begin your day with breakfast in the Yallungah Dining Room, where original architectural features are enhanced by vibrant local artwork. Unwind in the Guest Lounge, bathed in natural light and featuring a cosy fireplace, or retreat to your thoughtfully appointed room, where every detail is crafted for your comfort.

Ideally located to explore the beauty of country New South Wales, Yallungah is the perfect base for discovering Orange. Embark on a local wine tour, visit beautifully curated boutiques, dine at hatted restaurants and explore the town's historical sites - all just moments from your doorstep.
offer_address: 62 Byng Street, Orange, New South Wales 2800, Australia

title: Regional NSW Boutique Stay in the Heart of Orange
description:
Stylish luxury awaits amongst the rolling hills and spectacular scenery of the Central Tablelands region with a stay at The Remington Orange. Cutting-edge amenities, fabulous facilities and faultless service are hallmarks of this sophisticated hotel complete with a sleek fitness centre and masterfully appointed rooms. Foodies will fall in love with the onsite Whitney’s Restaurant & Bar, offering sharp culinary innovation, intimate surroundings and a focus on the region's best seasonal produce, all by the cosy glow of the crackling fireplace.

You'll be perfectly placed at the gateway to country New South Wales. Boundless jaw-dropping landscapes, world-class vineyards and orchards eagerly await across the region with a visit to Nashdale Lane Wines (only a 15-minute drive away) or at an array of renowned local restaurants, including gourmet darlings Lolli Redini, Tonic and cow-to-cone Spilt Milk Gelataria.
